sql-case.value: SELECT * FROM table1 UNION SELECT * FROM table2
SELECT * FROM table1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM table2
SELECT * FROM table1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM table2 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM table1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM table2 ORDER BY id LIMIT 1, 1
SELECT * FROM table1 INTERSECT SELECT * FROM table2 INTERSECT SELECT * FROM table3
SELECT * FROM table1 INTERSECT SELECT * FROM table2 INTERSECT SELECT * FROM table3 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM table1 INTERSECT SELECT * FROM table2 INTERSECT SELECT * FROM table3 ORDER BY id LIMIT 1, 1
SELECT * FROM table1 EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM table2 EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM table3
SELECT * FROM table1 EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM table2 EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM table3 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM table1 EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM table2 EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM table3 ORDER BY id LIMIT 1, 1
SELECT * FROM table1 MINUS SELECT * FROM table2
SELECT * FROM table1 MINUS SELECT * FROM table2 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM table1 MINUS SELECT * FROM table2 ORDER BY id LIMIT 1, 1
SELECT * FROM table1 UNION (SELECT * FROM table2 UNION SELECT * FROM table3)
